Blacksmith Hilda:
Do you have a request for Hilda? I can augment an item or remove augmentation.
By the way, do you have Life Stones? I heard that Life Stones can no longer be found. The good thing is that a more powerful stone has been found. It's called the Spirit Stone.
I'm busy, but if you have some Life Stones left, I can still augment items for you. If not, I can exchange them for Spirit Stones.
